description:
Your next opportunity awaits at Audi Beverly Hills. We are seeking a highly motivated and customer-oriented individual to join the team! The Floor Manager plays a crucial role on the sales floor by creating energy, momentum and productivity on the sales floor while providing coaching and direction to sales consultants.

Benefits

  • Health insurance
  • Dental insurance
  • Vision insurance
  • Paid time off
  • 401(k)
  • 401(k) matching
  • Flexible spending account
  • Professional development assistance
  • Life insurance
  • Employee assistance plan
  • Disability insurance

Responsibilities

  • Works directly with each team member to improve productivity
  • Assist in closing deals
  • Ensure follow up with unsold prospects utilizing appropriate methods of communication

Qualifications

  • Valid in-state driver's license and clean driving record
  • Previous experience in a sales role preferred

Pay: $168,000 - $192,000 per year is the expected total annual earnings after factoring in all forms of compensation including minimum guarantee, commissions, bonuses, benefits (vacation and sick), etc. Employees in this position will be paid a salary of $60,000 per year. Commissions and bonuses are expected to range from $108,000 - $132,000 per year based on performance.

At Audi Beverly Hills, we attract, nurture, and retain the most talented people in the industry by providing the highest quality work environment where productivity, creativity, and personal and professional growth can flourish. We believe our team sits behind the wheel of the Fletcher Jones brand that drives our company toward success.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer

Privacy Policy
